# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $150 by you. Considering its quality and unique features, I believe it's a great opportunity for you to experience its benefits. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at an exclusive price of $120. This is a special offer tailored to appreciate your interest and value your perception of the product's worth. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something truly exceptional. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
